sentences.en: After wading through the dark realm of the bureaucrat.
sentences.cn: 好不容易走出官僚们的黑暗王国.

sentences.en: Against imperialism, feudalism and bureaucrat - capitalism, and against capitalism.
sentences.cn: 对付帝国主义 、 封建主义、官僚资本主义, 对付资本主义.
官僚资本主义企业收归国有了.

sentences.en: But it begins with that bureaucrat. And if don self is the head of the snake.
sentences.cn: 如果DonSelf就是始作俑者, 那么我们就从他下手好了.

sentences.en: He defines bureaucrat as a desk - bound employee.
sentences.cn: 他把那些坐办公室的人称之为官僚.
他是个有很大权力的官僚.

sentences.en: I suppose my application has been lost by some incompetent bureaucrat.
sentences.cn: 我估计我的申请书不知道让哪个无能的官僚给弄丢了.

sentences.en: The bureaucrat did everything exactly as the law ordered.
sentences.cn: 那名官员十分奉公守法.

sentences.en: The bureaucrat had not learnt how markets work, and we are in danger of forgetting it.
sentences.cn: 这位官僚不懂市场是如何运作的, 而我们现在也有可能忘记这一点.

sentences.en: The Qi emperor treated the bureaucrat in exile as if he were a real aristocrat.
sentences.cn: 齐王对待寓公也像对待真正的贵族一样.

sentences.en: The ruling period of the Northern Warlords was the full developing stage of bureaucrat capital.
sentences.cn: 北洋军阀统治时期是官僚资本全面扩展的阶段.

sentences.en: The use of network makes the traditional administration paradigm of bureaucrat system face crises.
sentences.cn: 网络化使传统的官僚制行政范式面临危机.

sentences.en: This capital is popularly known in China as bureaucrat - capital.
sentences.cn: 这个资本,在中国的通俗名称,叫做 官僚资本 .

sentences.en: This hypocritical bureaucrat has done many bad things secretly.
sentences.cn: 这些虚伪的官绅背地里做尽了坏事.

sentences.en: Three of them were old ones , namely , imperialist ownership, feudal ownership and bureaucrat - capitalist ownership.
sentences.cn: 旧有的三张:帝国主义所有制, 封建主义所有制,官僚资本主义所有制.

words.tran_cn: 官僚主义；官僚机构；官僚政治

trans.tran_en: someone who works in a bureaucracy and uses official rules very strictly
